entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
